headline: Talen Energy, Constellation, and Vistra Stock Are on the Rise. What’s Lifting Shares.
summary: Shares of  Talen Energy Constellation Energy  and  Vistra  got a boost Wednesday after PJM Interconnection shared the results of its latest capacity auction, which highlighted a need for power generation to meet ramping demand.  Talen rose 8.7%, Constellation gained 4.6%, and Vistra was up 6% after the power grid operator said its 2026/2027 base residual auction had secured 134,311 megawatts of unforced capacity generation and demand response to meet the expected needs of 13 states and Washington, D.C.

headline: Talen Energy Stock, Constellation, and Vistra Are on the Rise. What’s Lifting the Shares.
summary: Shares of  Talen Energy Constellation Energy  and  Vistra  got a boost in premarket trading Wednesday after PJM Interconnection shared the results of its latest capacity auction, which highlighted a need for power generation to meet ramping demand.  Talen rose 10%, Constellation gained 3.5%, and  Vistra  rose 4.5% after the power grid operator said its 2026/2027 base residual auction had secured 134,311 megawatts of unforced capacity generation and demand response to meet the expected needs of 13 states and Washington D.C.

headline: AI Boom Leads to Record Costs on US Grid and Call for New Plants
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Businesses and households served by the largest US power grid will spend a record $16.1 billion to ensure electricity supplies — a result that prompted immediate calls from utilities and energy groups to build more generation amid the AI frenzy.Most Read from BloombergTrump Awards $1.26 Billion Contract to Build Biggest Immigrant Detention Center in USWhy the Federal Reserve’s Building Renovation Costs $2.5 BillionSalt Lake City Turns Winter Olympic Bid Into Statewide Bond BoomMil
